DOC.detailed_description: The incidence dose limit toxicity ( DLT ) evaluate cohort six patient start OCV-C02 administration dose level 1 ( OCV-103 OCV-104 0.3 mg ) , increase dose dose level 2 ( 1 mg ) , level 3 ( 3 mg ) , dose level 4 ( 6 mg ) . Once-weekly administration repeat four time treatment cycle , incidence DLT Day 1 Day 29 evaluate . At end Cycle 1 , patient wish continue OCV-C02 treatment provide write consent permit continue participation trial use dose schedule subsequent cycle Cycle 1 .
